mapper.select:
SELECT H.*, HS.average
, IF(B.MNO = #{mno},'Y','N') AS BOOKMARK
FROM HERITAGE H LEFT JOIN HERIBOOKMARK B ON(H.HNO = B.HNO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT hNo, AVG(rating) AS average FROM HeritageStars GROUP BY hNo ) HS ON (H.hNo = HS.hNo) WHERE (B.MNO IS NULL
OR B.MNO = #{mno}
)
AND H.NAME LIKE '%${name}%'
AND H.LOCATION LIKE '%${address}%'
AND H.ERA LIKE '%${era}%'
AND H.GCODENAME LIKE '%${type}%'
ORDER BY H.HNO ASC
ORDER BY H.name ASC
ORDER BY average DESC
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HERITAGE WHERE 1 = 1
AND NAME LIKE '%${name}%'
AND LOCATION LIKE '%${address}%'
AND ERA LIKE '%${era}%'
AND GCODENAME LIKE '%${type}%'
